text: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ إِلَٰهٞ وَفِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِلَٰهٞۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

translation.en: And it is Allah who is [the only] deity in the heaven, and on the earth [the only] deity. And He is the Wise, the Knowing
translation.id: Dan Dialah Tuhan (yang disembah) di langit dan Tuhan (yang disembah) di bumi, dan Dialah Yang Mahabijaksana, Maha Mengetahui
